> üåø **Vegan & Dairy-free**
Recipe is using only soy milk and protein. Process on *Frozen Yogurt*, [hold it shortly under running water](https://jhermann.github.io/ice-creamery/info/tips%2Btricks/#handling-of-icy-sides-bottom) *after* that. Then a scrape-down and a respin. Rating: üòãüçéüçè (untested)

**Mix-in Options**

 * 20g [Almond slivers](../../T/Toppings/#chopped-nuts) ‚Ä¢ Mixin / Topping
 * 10g Raisins ‚Ä¢ Mixin / Topping

1. In an empty tub, blend the hemp hearts and parts of the milk to a smooth puree.
 1. Then add all the other ‚Äòwet‚Äô ingredients.
1. Before freezing, let it rest in the fridge for at least 2 hours.
The [brand names] used are in brackets.
